snippet: The first presidential debate sharply exposed President Obama’s vulnerabilities and forced his advisers to work to reclaim the campaign over a grueling 30 days, ending with his triumph on Tuesday.
abstract: October 3 presidential debate, in which Pres Barack Obama performed poorly against Mitt Romney, sharply exposed Obama's vulnerabilities and forced his advisers to work to reclaim the campaign over a grueling 30 days, ending with his triumph.

byline.original: By ADAM NAGOURNEY, ASHLEY PARKER, JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY
byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro, Michael D. Shear and Peter Baker contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The first presidential debate sharply exposed President Obama’s vulnerabilities and forced his advisers to work to reclaim the campaign over a grueling 30 days, ending with his triumph on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Obama Campaign Clawed Back After a Dismal Debate
headline.main: How a Race in the Balance Went to Obama
headline.print_headline: How a Race in the Balance Went to Obama
